rooms.name: The Dwarven Drop Off
rooms.description:
This is where the dwarven mommies and daddies come to drop off their
annoying little brats.  You have the urge to leave.  There is a sign here.

south.description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

extra_descriptions.description: This is an area for newbies, so have fun.  -- Sandman

rooms.name: Day Care Center
rooms.description:
You are in the north-east corner of the main part of the center.  Toys and
toddlers are all over the room.  There is a kitchen to the east.

east.description: You see an extremely messy kitchen.

south.description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

west.description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

rooms.name: Day Care Center
rooms.description:
You are in the north-west corner of the main part of the center.  Toys and
toddlers are all over the room.  There is a bathroom to the west.

east.description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

south.description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

rooms.name: Day Care Center
rooms.description:
You are in the south-east corner of the main part of the center.  Toys and
toddlers are all over the room.  There is a playground to the east.

north.description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

west.description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

rooms.name: Day Care Center
rooms.description:
You are in the south-west corner of the main part of the center.  Toys and
toddlers are all over the room.  There is a staircase to the west.

north.description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

east.description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

west.description: You see a staircase leading down.

rooms.name: The Messy Bathroom
rooms.description:
You hold your nose as you realize you have made the worst mistake of your
life.  The air is rancid and the walls are stained.

east.description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

rooms.name: The Staircase
rooms.description:
You stand on top of a staircase leading down, and wonder what mystery could
lie down under.  Beware!

east.description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

down.description: You see the entrance to something.

rooms.name: The Playground
rooms.description: You are in the north-west corner of the playground.

rooms.name: The Playground
rooms.description: You are in the north-east corner of the playground.

rooms.name: The Playground
rooms.description: You are in the south-west corner of the playground.

west.description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

rooms.name: The Playground
rooms.description: You are in the south-east corner of the playground.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Mini-Maze
rooms.description:
You stand in the entrance to a small, but confusing maze.  You really hope
that you don't get lost.

rooms.name: Mini-Maze
rooms.description: You are in a small passage that looks just like every other one.

rooms.name: Mini-Maze
rooms.description: You are in a small passage that looks just like every other one.

rooms.name: Mini-Maze
rooms.description: You are in a small passage that looks just like every other one.

rooms.name: Mini-Maze
rooms.description: You are in a small passage that looks just like every other one.

rooms.name: End of the Mini-Maze
rooms.description:
You stand at the end of your journey.  There is a big sign here and you had
better read it!

extra_descriptions.description:
If you are not level 6 or above, then don't go south!!!!  It is a dangerous
area, but congrats for getting this far - Sandman

rooms.name: Messy Kitchen
rooms.description:
You stand in the kitchen and eating area of the day care center.  Pots and
pans are everywhere, while the toddlers continue to create chaos.

west.description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

rooms.name: The End?
rooms.description:
You have reached the final lair.  It is dominated by a huge five headed
dragon (actually an overgrown brat with a Halloween mask).

mobiles.name: the dwarven youth
mobiles.description: A young dwarf plays with a toy axe.

mobiles.name: a teddy bear
mobiles.description: A cute and fuzzy teddy bear stands here.

mobiles.name: a raggedy anne doll
mobiles.description: A raggedy anne doll is sitting here.

mobiles.name: a toy soldier
mobiles.description: A toy soldier is standing here.

mobiles.name: the ugly bear
mobiles.description: An ugly stuffed bear stands here.

mobiles.name: an old doll
mobiles.description: An abused and old doll is here.

mobiles.name: the nanny
mobiles.description: An old wrinkled nanny stands here, looking over the little ones.

mobiles.name: the armed guard
mobiles.description: An armed guard stands here looking lost.

mobiles.name: the spoiled brat
mobiles.description: A spoiled brat is crying here.

objects.name: a toy axe
objects.description: An axe made of wood lies here.

objects.name: a pink ice ring
objects.description: A pink ice ring draws your eye.

objects.name: a linen robe
objects.description: A linen robe is crumpled into a ball here.

objects.name: a broom
objects.description: A stout straw broom lies on the floor.

objects.name: a juicy steak
objects.description: A juicy steak sits on a plate here.

objects.name: a rotten steak
objects.description: A dry steak lies on the floor.

objects.name: an amber potion
objects.description: An amber potion sits in a corner.

objects.name: a toy gun
objects.description: A toy gun with a sharp bayonet lies here.
